alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prairie, southern Monroe and northeastern Arkansas Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stuttgart Municipal Airport, or 7 miles north of Stuttgart, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Holly Grove... Ulm... Roe... Palmer... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Aberdeen... Slovak... Casscoe... Crocketts Bluff... Ragtown... Pine City... Lawrenceville... Duncan... Cross Roads in Monroe County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
